revised_title: A Supplement to the Materia Medica: Exploring Ancient and Modern Medicinal Practices
tldr: This article discusses the author's efforts to create a supplement to his previous work on the Materia Medica, exploring various aspects of medicine, including the use of cold baths, mineral waters, and different types of salts. The author also delves into the identification and classification of plants, herbs, and other natural remedies, drawing from ancient sources like Dioscorides and contemporary knowledge. The supplement aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of medicinal practices, both ancient and modern, for the benefit of curious readers.
